import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./Register.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Register=()=>{const[form,setForm]=useState({name:'',email:'',password:'',role:'user'});const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const navigate=useNavigate();const handleChange=e=>{setForm({...form,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};const handleRegister=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setLoading(true);try{const response=await fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/register',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(form)});const data=await response.json();if(response.ok){alert('‚úÖ Registration successful!
